introVerses.text: And we know that all things work together for good to them that love God, to them who are the called according to his purpose.
introVerses.reflection: How might this verse shape the way you view your current circumstances?

introVerses.text: Trust in the Lord with all thine heart; and lean not unto thine own understanding. In all thy ways acknowledge him, and he shall direct thy paths.
introVerses.reflection: What would it look like for you to trust God more fully today?

introVerses.text: Thy word is a lamp unto my feet, and a light unto my path.
introVerses.reflection: Where do you need guidance right now?

introVerses.text: Fear thou not; for I am with thee: be not dismayed; for I am thy God: I will strengthen thee...
introVerses.reflection: What part of this promise speaks to your heart today?

introVerses.text: All scripture is given by inspiration of God, and is profitable for doctrine, for reproof, for correction, for instruction in righteousness...
introVerses.reflection: How does this verse affirm the importance of Bible study in your life?

introVerses.text: In the beginning was the Word, and the Word was with God, and the Word was God.
introVerses.reflection: What does this tell you about who Jesus is?

introVerses.text: Be careful for nothing; but in every thing by prayer and supplication with thanksgiving let your requests be made known unto God...
introVerses.reflection: Is there something you need to bring to God in prayer today?
